message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its unique features and the value it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This is an exceptional deal considering the market value and the benefits you'll receive. I believe this investment will greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're adding to the product. However, I'm currently looking to stay within a budget of $12000 for this purchase. Would it be possible to negotiate a price closer to my budget?
